content.prompt: What point of view does Ms. Kagawa express at first?

choices.label: She feels that students do not like to volunteer.
She thinks that students should not be required to volunteer.
She opposes having volunteers in the classroom.
She wants to see teachers volunteer more.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
